localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Language learning is hard... so we made it soft. It's time to turn your bathroom into a classroom with our latest innovation: toilet paper that teaches you phrases in new languages! Never miss a lesson again, because nature is the best push notification.
blogPost.body: Language learning is hard... so we made it soft. It's time to turn your bathroom into a classroom with our latest innovation: toilet paper that teaches you phrases in new languages! Never miss a lesson again, because nature is the best push notification.
blogPost.title: Duolingo Roll - Turn your bathroom into a classroom
blogPost.author: Jack Morgan

previous.excerpt: Cobrowse any website with your teammates! Vera co-browsing makes it possible for you to co-browse any website with your friend--to work on a Google Doc, to watch a video together-- free to chat as long as you want! More collaborative feature will be added!
previous.title: Vera Co-Browsing - Co-browse Google Docs, Figma, videos, PDFs or any website
